Uses of Class
openadk.library.tools.mapping.MappingsContext

Packages that use MappingsContext
openadk.library.tools.mapping The Mappings class and its supporting classes and interfaces simplify the task of mapping field values between the local application's data structures and SIF Data Objects. 
openadk.library.tools.queries The QueryFormatter class and its supporting classes simplify the task of converting SIF_Query elements to other forms such as SQL statements 
 

Uses of MappingsContext in openadk.library.tools.mapping
 

Methods in openadk.library.tools.mapping that return MappingsContext
static MappingsContext MappingsContext.create(Mappings m, MappingsDirection direction, SIFVersion version, ElementDef elementDef)
          Creates a MappingsContext instance to handle a set of mappings operations using the same parameters
 MappingsContext Mappings.selectInbound(ElementDef elementDef, SIFMessageInfo message)
          Selects an appropriate MappingsContext object to use for an inbound map operation.
 MappingsContext Mappings.selectInbound(ElementDef elementDef, SIFVersion version, java.lang.String zoneId, java.lang.String sourceId)
          Selects an appropriate MappingsContext object to use for an inbound map operation.
 MappingsContext Mappings.selectOutbound(ElementDef elementDef, SIFMessageInfo message)
          Selects an appropriate MappingsContext object to use for an outbound map operation.
 MappingsContext Mappings.selectOutbound(ElementDef elementDef, SIFVersion version, java.lang.String zoneId, java.lang.String sourceId)
          Selects an appropriate MappingsContext object to use for an outbound map operation.
 

Uses of MappingsContext in openadk.library.tools.queries
 

Methods in openadk.library.tools.queries with parameters of type MappingsContext
 void SQLQueryFormatter.addFields(MappingsContext context)
          Adds SQLFields to represent each field rule in the specified MappingsContext.
 void SQLQueryFormatter.addFields(MappingsContext context, Dialect dialect)
          Adds SQLFields to represent each field rule in the specified MappingsContext.
